title: Israel: an adventure
creator_contributor_role: Israel Government Tourist Office, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Israel - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Jerusalem - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Israel - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Israel - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Jewish-Arab relations
description: A kaleidoscopic tour of Israel where the past, present and future lie open side by side: Acre, where Jew and Arab work peacefully side by side; the modern city of Haifa with its harbour, industries and big blocks of flats; the Catacombs, Hebrew University; Jerusalem with its churches from many countries and a Yemenite wedding rehearsal. Narrated by Christopher Plummer.
